name: Tecmo Super Hockey
overview: Take the ice for top quality sports action with Tecmo Super Hockey. Officially licensed by the National Hockey League Players' Association, Tecmo Super Hockey sets a new standard for game player satisfaction. We think you'll agree that, feature for feature, this is the greatest ice hockey video game ever made. Tecmo Super Hockey has a full roster of real players, complete with each player's individual stats. Fast moving action and super realistic play make this the game to beat. So, go with Tecmo Super Hockey and go for the goal!
